slot-machine.not-enought-points: You don't have enough points to play. Visit www.createyourevent.org/points-list to find out how to get more points on Create Your Event to play.
slot-machine.bell.info: For 3 bells you will receive a voucher for a product at an event (drink, food...) worth CHF 10.
slot-machine.plum.info: For 3 plums you will receive a voucher for a product at an event (drink, food...) worth CHF 5.00.
slot-machine.orange.info: For 3 oranges you will receive a voucher for a product at an event (drink, food...) worth CHF 2.50.
slot-machine.cherry.info: For 3 cherries you will receive a voucher for a product at an event (drink, food...) worth CHF 7.50.
